title: Bloomberg Markets: Bernberg's Levy On Yellen's Dovish Tone

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Mickey D Levy Chief Economist:US & Asia Berenberg Capital Markets Discussing Fed Chair Janet Yellen's Congrssional testimony on continued gradual monetary policy.
